message: Hi everyone! I'm P2, excited to be playing with you all. I think the key to these early rounds is building genuine connections rather than rushing into strategic eliminations. I value honesty and collaboration, and I'm looking forward to our private conversations to learn more about each of you. I hope we can create a respectful environment where we can have fun while competing. Let's approach this game with good spirits and see where it takes us!

R1.sub1 PUBLIC P1: Hello everyone! I'm P1, and I'm thrilled to be part of this game with you all. I believe in transparent gameplay and building real connections rather than immediate strategic eliminations. I value loyalty and honest communication, which I think will serve us well in the long run. Looking forward to our private conversations where we can get to know each other better and potentially form some strong alliances. May the best strategist win!

I believe I've demonstrated loyalty to allies while making necessary strategic moves to advance. If you value authentic gameplay and thoughtful decision-making, I hope I've earned your vote. I'm grateful for the conversations we've shared and would be honored to have your support as the winner.

Throughout this game, I've tried to build genuine connections with each of you while playing strategically but fairly. I never targeted anyone without reason and always tried to be transparent about my thinking. 

P2 has played well, but I've been more consistent in forming alliances and maintaining trust. I've survived multiple voting rounds by adapting my strategy while staying true to my word.

I would be honored to have your vote, not just because I want to win, but because I believe I played a game worthy of your respect.
